entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Summerside
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:31 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Summerside 07:00 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023
Temperature: -3.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 98 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -3.6°C
Wind: N 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: Snow at times heavy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Risk of freezing rain late this afternoon. Snowfall amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon then increasing to 40 gusting to 70. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy or rain. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Rain or snow changing to snow at times heavy this evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Snowfall amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 50 gusting to 70 overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then clearing. Blowing snow over exposed areas early in the morning. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023
